hero-subtitle: Authentic Indonesian flavors in elegant presentation
about-story-1: Warung Sumatra is where traditional Indonesian cuisine meets modern elegance. Our recipes come from the island of Sumatra and other regions of Indonesia, passed down through generations.
about-story-2: We prepare each dish with the freshest ingredients, using authentic spices imported directly from Indonesia. Our team of chefs combines traditional techniques with modern presentation.
food-subtitle: Discover the richness of Indonesian cuisine in our signature interpretations
dish-nasi-desc: Traditional Indonesian fried rice with vegetables, egg and aromatic spices
dish-rendang-desc: Aromatic beef curry cooked in coconut milk with rich spice blend
dish-gado-desc: Fresh vegetable salad served with traditional peanut satay sauce
menu-nasi-ayam-desc: Fried rice with chicken and vegetables
demo-text: This is a sample contact form. In real implementation it would require backend connection.
form-success: Demo: Form submitted! In real version the message would be sent to the restaurant.
footer-tagline: Authentic Indonesian flavors in elegant presentation
